attributes.action: require all employers to give workers the right to work at home where practicable
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Using modern technology, many jobs (especially office-based ones) could very easily be done at home; if not all the time then certainly for certain days of the week or parts of the year.

If journeys into town and city centres at peak times were reduced Government could avoid some expenditure on upgrading roads and railways.

Commuters could reduce their travelling costs and improve their work/life balance.

Employers could reduce their office costs and absenteeism due to minor illnesses and caring responsibilities. Many employers have found productivity rises when work is done at home.

The environment would benefit from reductions in pollution.

My petition fits into a number of categories inclusing business and industry, employment, jobs and careers, environment, health, well-being and care, science, technology and innovation and transport and infrastructure. 

I would like it listed under all these please
